title: Pinnacle Studio Ultimate 19.1.3.320 (x86x64) Multilingual Incl P
description:
[B]Pinnacle Studio Ultimate 19.1.3.320 (x86/x64) Multilingual [/B]

[img]https://dump.bz/storage-2/0316/hYdThb8NZMWKVhXdWJZtXB1CoBOJmR0D.jpg[/img]

[b]The Ultimate Video-Editing Software. Your movies look their best from every angle with the power of Pinnacle Studio 19 Ultimate and its new Multi-Camera Editor. View and edit footage from up to 6 cameras, and align clips automatically with Audio Syncing. Easily lower background sound to keep dialog and narration clear with new Audio Ducking.

Take on any editing project with confidence thanks to 64-bit speed, unlimited-track frame-accurate editing in 4K, HD and 3D, and broad format support, including new XAVC decoding, DVCPRO HD decoding, and VFR and MXF support. With 2,000+ effects, transitions and titles, and NewBlue Video Essentials IV, your movies will look stunning wherever you share themâ€”online, on devices or on disc.

â€¢ New! Multi-camera editing
â€¢ New! Audio Ducking balances dialog and background sound
â€¢ New! Optimized for Intel's 6th Generation processor
â€¢ New! Premium effects from NewBlue
â€¢ Enhanced! Live Screen Capture
â€¢ 4K Ultra HD, including XAVC S support
â€¢ 2,000+ effects, transitions and templates
â€¢ Unlimited-track frame-accurate editing
â€¢ iZotope Music & Speech Cleaner

What's new in Pinnacle Studio Ultimate 19:

Multi-Camera Editor
Work with footage from 6 cameras to create more dynamic videos. The Multi-Camera Editor lets you screen your footage, switch angles, cut and delete, and add transitions. Align clips automatically with Audio Syncing or use markers, date/time or manual syncing. Even use your multi-camera results to create a Picture-in-Picture effect.

NewBlue Bonus Effects, now with Video Essentials IV
Explore endless creative possibilities with over 800 presets and more than 65 plugins from industry leader NewBlue. This bonus pack includes tools for image stabilization, creative effects, exciting translations and more.

Remove unwanted noise and enhance audio
iZotope Music & Speech Cleaner easily removes unwanted noise from your audio and video files. Experience increased audio clarity and enhanced sound!

XAVCS support for 4K and HD
Work with XAVC S, a new standard for video cameras based on MP4-AVC/H.264, and get support for resolutions up to 4K 3840 x 2160. Includes new XAVC decoding in this release.

4K Ultra HD video support
Produce breathtaking video with support for 4K Ultra HD.

New formats support
Keep pace with the latest formats with new support for DVCPRO HD, MXF import and VFR files.

Operation Systems:
Windows 10, Windows 8.x, Windows 7, 64-bit OS highly recommended.[/b]
